Ho Chi Minh City Social Insurance cooperates with

2 receives more than 10,000 medical examinations and treatment visits for

Patients are already familiar with this method.
Currently, hospitals in general and

ladies and gentlemen yesterday the Indonesian Ministry of Transport
announced that it will open an
investigation into the incident of the captain and  The co-pilot of
Btic Air fell asleep for 28 minutes.
The incident happened on January 25
but was only revealed to the new media.
According to the departmental report of the
Indonesian National Traffic Safety Committee, the incident
occurred.  appeared on flight number btk
6723 carrying 153 passengers on a flight
from Southeast Sulawesi to the capital Jakarta
on January 25. The two pilots involved
were both Indonesians, in which the
captain was 32 years old and the co-pilot was 28 years old.
hours after takeoff, the
captain told the co-pilot that he needed to
rest and the co-pilot agreed. The co-pilot then took
control of the plane but also fell
asleep. The air traffic control center in
Jakarta tried to contact  the plane but did
not receive a response for about 28 minutes,
then the captain woke up and discovered that the co-
pilot was also sleeping, causing the plane to go.
Batic Air safety also said that the
pilots involved in the incident were
temporarily suspended. Every year in the first week of

according to scientists at
Cambridge University 1/4 of the number of Labrador dogs and
66  ph the number of golden retrievers carrying the
bomc mutation makes them prone to weight gain the
bomc gene mutation affects the way
they control their body weight in
two ways the first is to increase their muscle
appetite and the second is to make them
A study in the journal
Sence Advance also found that
dogs with the bomc mutation expended
25% less energy at rest, meaning
they had to take in fewer calories if they wanted to
maintain a healthy weight.  In addition, the way the
PC gene works in dogs and humans is
similar. People with the PC gene mutation
also tend to have an appetite and are prone to
obesity, so the further goal of
scientists is to find drugs to reduce the risk of obesity.

in an effort to protect resident birds that are
facing extinction,
environmentalists and park rangers

new project is to build an artificial blast site as a
resting place for
birds, with migratory birds
making it a safe place to land after
traveling thousands of kilometers from
breeding areas in Russia or China.
Queensland Chief Review Every year, there are 40 floating net bags on the ground
between two fixed mudflats on the ground and
along each vehicle, a
total of 120 bags. According to statistics, some
migratory bird species such as the curlew-billed sandpiper have
decreased by up to 80 PH in the past year.  Over the past 30 years, if the
high tides have affected the caeca too much,
they may not have enough strength to return to
reproduce or they will simply
die because the flight is too long. The
volunteers will continue to monitor and see.
whether the birds will be comfortable or not
and hopefully this artificial floating beach
will become a place to provide food for

Yesterday, the police of Dak Rong district,
Quang Tri province, caught two subjects
transporting large quantities of synthetic drugs,
17-year-old Le Quan Hac and Nguyen
Cong.  A 16-year-old man living in Huong
Hoa district, around 5 p.m. on March 9, the
district police received a report that two young
men were transporting drugs on a passenger bus
traveling on Lao Dong h route when the vehicle
reached provincial road 588a passing through.  Town
Police blocked and arrested the two
subjects. Through police inspection, they discovered that
both had tape wrapped around their stomachs to
hide 12,000 tablets of synthetic drugs in the
form of heroin. Both admitted their crimes.  This

kg of drugs drifting ashore on
Ly
Son island district. Earlier in the morning, 32-

ladies and gentlemen, a large fire broke out in
an event business house
on Yen So street.  Hanoi then spread to four
surrounding houses this afternoon. Fortunately, there were
no injuries, according
to Hoang Mai district police. Fire erupted
from businesses serving
wedding events. This house is about 60 meters wide. It is
one floor high on the side.  The house contained
many flammable items, so the fire was strong. Many
fire engines and dozens of police were
mobilized to the school to extinguish the fire.
However, the fire quickly flared up and
spread to four houses surrounding the
black column.  From the fire that was dozens of
meters high until about 3:20 p.m. on the same day, the fire
was basically controlled and did not cause any
human casualties, but caused many
furniture and goods in the house to be destroyed. The
cause of the incident is under investigation.  This is the
